## WebTileRenderingOptions interface

An interface for the rendering options that can be passed to the \[\[WebTileDataSource\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface WebTileRenderingOptions 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [opacity](./harp-webtile-datasource.webtilerenderingoptions.opacity.md) | number | Opacity of the rendered images.  1.0 |
